ModulePrefs.title: Underwater Adventure Rocket Bazooka Guys II

Module.Content:
<!doctype html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Underwater Adventure Rocket Bazooka Guys II</title> <!-- Use this for production or something? --> <!--<script src="//talkgadget.google.com/hangouts/_/api/hangout.js?v=1.2"></script>--> <script src="//hangoutsapi.talkgadget.google.com/hangouts/_/api/hangout.js?v=1.2"></script>
</head> <body> <!-- src="http://bazookaguys.tk/" --> <iframe id="iframe" style="width: 960px; height: 660px"></iframe>
<script> // all google hangout code should be in this file. It's too hard to actually load things gapi.hangout.onApiReady.add(function(eventObj) { var iframe = document.getElementById("iframe") console.log("PARTICIPANT", gapi.hangout.getLocalParticipant()) console.log("HENRY", gapi.hangout.getHangoutId())
// iframe.src="http://localhost:3000/#/identify?gameId=12345&name=bobert" // iframe.src="http://bazookaguys.tk" }); </script> </body> </html>
